title: Mass Shootings - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/5/19
itunes:title: Mass Shootings - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/5/19
description:
George Noory and psychiatrist Dr. Peter Breggin explore the possible motives and mental issues facing the alleged gunmen in the deadly mass shootings in El Paso Texas and Dayton Ohio.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
